body: the girls mother is having affair with guys father. the girl plans to get revenge by letting the guy fuck her mom and record it and sending it to the guys father. the recording consists of generic stuff like i cant live without his cock he make me feel good and stuff. resulting in breaking up of both the parties and the mom got mind broken
Somebody explain a little to me please

Well, thats some revenge well done. Would be funny tho if the girl after having destroyed the mother and blaming her for everything that happened found out that his father was also cheating with someone else and couldnt care less about the whole family situation xD
It was good. Too bad it kinda marred by the translation.
Physics is wrong in 21 page. Her boobs are too stiff to hang loose

Cheating tears a family apart, and this girl knew that even before everything became out in the open. So she decided to punish the main culprit, her own mother, to salvage what's left of her family. Most likely the videos will be used as evidence against the mother in the divorce, the girl will happily go with her father since he's more trustworthy and can actually provide for her [though the mother could if she became a hooker Lol!] I can't help but call this Justice.

I think a round of applause is in order for this flawless revenge plot. 
 That girl is gonna grow up to become one badass bitch.
